インタフェースの使用
org.sxb.kit.io.InputStreamSource

  • InputStreamSourceを使用しているパッケージ 
    パッケージ 説明
    org.sxb.kit.io
    JBOSS VFS以及各种文件的输入输出流工具类包
    org.sxb.mail.support.javamail
    JavaMail support for Spring's mail infrastructure.

    • org.sxb.kit.ioでのInputStreamSourceの使用

      org.sxb.kit.ioでのInputStreamSourceのサブインタフェース 
      修飾子とタイプ インタフェースと説明
      interface  Resource
      Interface for a resource descriptor that abstracts from the actual type of underlying resource, such as a file or class path resource.
      InputStreamSourceを実装しているorg.sxb.kit.ioのクラス 
      修飾子とタイプ クラスと説明
      class  AbstractFileResolvingResource
      Abstract base class for resources which resolve URLs into File references, such as UrlResource or ClassPathResource.
      class  AbstractResource
      Convenience base class for Resource implementations, pre-implementing typical behavior.
      class  ByteArrayResource
      Resource implementation for a given byte array.
      class  ClassPathResource
      Resource implementation for class path resources.
      class  InputStreamResource
      Resource implementation for a given InputStream.
      class  VfsResource
      JBoss VFS based Resource implementation.

    • org.sxb.mail.support.javamailでのInputStreamSourceの使用

      InputStreamSource型のパラメータを持つorg.sxb.mail.support.javamailのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void MimeMessageHelper.addAttachment(java.lang.String attachmentFilename, InputStreamSource inputStreamSource)
      Add an attachment to the MimeMessage, taking the content from an org.sxb.io.InputStreamResource.
      void MimeMessageHelper.addAttachment(java.lang.String attachmentFilename, InputStreamSource inputStreamSource, java.lang.String contentType)
      Add an attachment to the MimeMessage, taking the content from an org.sxb.io.InputStreamResource.
      void MimeMessageHelper.addInline(java.lang.String contentId, InputStreamSource inputStreamSource, java.lang.String contentType)
      Add an inline element to the MimeMessage, taking the content from an org.sxb.InputStreamResource, and specifying the content type explicitly.
